name: Tower of Hanoi (spudugly)
description:
Intro

This is a simple puzzle game where you move disks one at a time to get them all to the right most peg in the fewest moves possible.

Made with Pygame.

how to play
  • Use your mouse to click the "+" and "-" buttons to increase or decrease the number of disk the game will have.
  • Click play to start the game with that number of disks
  • Click and drag a disk to a peg and release it to place the disk on that peg.
Rules
  • You can only move one disk at a time.
  • Disks can only be moved if they are the top most disk on a peg.
  • Disks can only only be placed either on an empty peg or on top of a disk that is larger than the one being moved.
Install instructions

unzip folder and run the "tower_of_hanoi.exe" file
